name: Mohammad Fahim Muntasir Akib
title: Full Stack Developer
description: I am a passionate full-stack developer with expertise in building modern web applications. With a strong foundation in both frontend and backend technologies, I create seamless, user-friendly experiences that solve real-world problems.
longDescription: I specialize in JavaScript/TypeScript ecosystems, with particular focus on React, Next.js, Node.js, and various database technologies. My approach combines technical excellence with creative problem-solving to deliver solutions that exceed expectations. I'm constantly learning and adapting to new technologies to stay at the forefront of web development.
